divs: Sighting Detailsi was on a street playing footballi noticed it because it poped out of nowwhere.I thought it was a ufo and i all ways wanted to see one.it zoomed real fast and i coulnd explain.i lost it because it went real fast.
Summary: white, no propelers, round ,and disked shaped
